abstract: Senator Christopher J. Dodd, Democrat of Connecticut, said he would continue to press for consumer protection legislation to make permanent changes.
snippet: Senator Christopher J. Dodd, Democrat of Connecticut, said he would continue to press for consumer protection legislation to make permanent changes.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo on Wednesday became the latest large bank to announce that it would reduce overdraft fees amid criticism from lawmakers that the charges were too high and assessed too often.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Joins in Cutting Overdraft Fees
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Joins in Cutting Overdraft Fees
